items.title: 英国可能撤回要求苹果为加密用户数据留后门的争议性要求 (原标题: UK May Backtrack on Controversial Demand for Backdoor to Encrypted Apple User Data)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
### 英国可能撤回对苹果加密数据后门的要求

《金融时报》报道称，英国政府可能被迫放弃其要求苹果为其加密用户数据构建后门的计划。

#### 背景与争议起源

*   **秘密要求**：今年2月，英国政府被曝秘密要求苹果允许其访问所有上传到iCloud的加密用户内容。
*   **政府理由**：英国政府辩称，这种能力对于执法部门和安全机构调查恐怖主义和儿童性虐待等严重犯罪是必要的，尽管这在其他民主国家是前所未有的。
*   **苹果的回应**：作为回应，苹果公司在英国移除了“高级数据保护”功能，并提起法律诉讼，试图推翻这一要求。

#### 美国政府的介入与英国的立场转变

*   **美国施压**：现在，向《金融时报》透露消息的英国高级官员表示，在来自美国政府的压力下，英国很可能放弃该计划。一位官员指出：“副总统对此非常恼火，这需要解决。内政部基本上将不得不让步。”
*   **美方担忧**：美国将加密问题视为“红线”，不希望英国干预其科技公司。要求在iCloud中构建后门并破坏苹果的端到端加密，可能会阻碍与美国在人工智能和数据合作方面的重要技术协议，并已导致两国政府之间的摩擦。
*   **美国高层反对**：包括总统、副总统和国家情报总监在内的美国政府高级成员都对英国政府的要求提出了强烈反对。
*   **《金融时报》评论**：《金融时报》称，英国内政部处理苹果加密问题“非常糟糕”，现在已“背水一战”。

#### 当前状态

*   尽管面临压力，英国政府目前似乎仍在推进该要求，据称本月仍在与律师讨论下一步措施。

![iCloud Versus UK Key Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/DJt4yhlUGQL70lVg5j2lXcCiu10=/400x0/article-new/2025/02/iCloud-Versus-UK-Key-Feature.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 英国政府可能撤回其要求苹果为加密用户数据提供后门的争议性计划。此前，英国秘密要求访问iCloud数据以协助执法，但遭到苹果反对。现在，由于美国政府的强烈施压，担心此举会损害美英在人工智能和数据方面的关键技术合作，英国官员透露该计划很可能被放弃。美国将对科技公司的加密要求视为“红线”，并已有多位高级官员对此表示强烈反对。尽管如此，英国政府目前似乎仍在推进该要求。
items.translated_title: 英国可能撤回要求苹果为加密用户数据留后门的争议性要求
items.content:
The British government may be forced to drop its plans to force Apple to build a backdoor to access encrypted user data, the Financial Times reports.


In February, it emerged that the British government had secretly demanded Apple gives it access to all encrypted user content uploaded to iCloud. It argued the ability, which is unprecedented for any other democratic country, is necessary for law enforcement and the security services to investigate serious crimes such as terrorism and child sexual abuse. In response, Apple removed Advanced Data Protection from the UK‌ and filed a legal complaint in an attempt to quash the demand.

Now, senior British officials speaking to the Financial Times say that the UK is likely to drop the plan amid pressure from the U.S. government:
This is something that the vice-president is very annoyed about and which needs to be resolved. The Home Office is basically going to have to back down.

One of the challenges for the tech partnerships we're working on is the encryption issue. It's a big red line in the US — they don't want us messing with their tech companies.


The demand to build a backdoor into ‌iCloud‌ and break Apple's end-to-end encryption could impede vital technology agreements with the U.S. related to artificial intelligence and data partnerships, and has already caused friction between the two governments. Senior members of the U.S. administration, including the President, Vice-President, and Director of National Intelligence, have all raised strong objections to the British government's request.

The Financial Times says that the British Home Office has handled the issue of Apple encryption "very badly" and now has "its back against the wall." For now, the government still appears to be pursuing the demand and apparently discussed next steps with lawyers as recently as this month.
Tags: Financial Times, United Kingdom

items.title: iOS 26 公测版预计本周发布，首个 iOS 27 传闻浮出水面 (原标题: iOS 26 Public Beta Expected This Week as First iOS 27 Rumor Surfaces)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### iOS 26 公测版与 iOS 27 传闻

根据彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）的报道，iOS 26 的首个公测版预计将于本周发布。

#### iOS 26 公测版发布详情

*   **发布时间预测**：古尔曼在其“Power On”时事通讯中指出，“所有迹象表明，iOS 26 应在本周进入公测阶段。”他上周在社交媒体上曾表示，iOS 26 公测版很可能在 7 月 23 日（星期三）或前后发布。
*   **苹果官方声明**：苹果此前已宣布 iOS 26 公测版将于 7 月推出，但未提供具体时间表。
*   **同步发布的公测版**：除了 iOS 26，iPadOS 26、macOS 26、tvOS 26、watchOS 26 和 HomePod 软件 26 的首个公测版也应同步发布。
*   **AirPods 固件公测版**：苹果计划首次提供其下一代 AirPods 固件更新的公测版。
*   **visionOS 26**：根据苹果的测试版网站，苹果不计划提供 visionOS 26 的公测版。

#### 如何参与公测

*   **免费注册**：任何人都可以免费注册成为 Apple Beta 软件计划的成员，以获取测试版软件的访问权限。
*   **重要提示**：在安装测试版软件之前，强烈建议备份设备，以防出现问题。
*   **开发者测试版**：所有更新的开发者测试版已可用。几年前，苹果取消了每年 99 美元的 Apple 开发者计划会员费要求，但仍需拥有 Apple 开发者账户才能访问开发者测试版。不过，公众应等待公测版的发布。

#### 首个 iOS 27 传闻浮出水面

*   **开发重点**：古尔曼透露，苹果将很快正式启动 iOS 27 的开发工作，并计划优先开发针对传闻已久的折叠式 iPhone 的软件功能。
*   **折叠式 iPhone 预期发布**：这款折叠设备预计将于明年下半年推出。

![iOS 26 on Three iPhones](https://images.macrumors.com/t/T-wXm4YuRC1oaKVIYmUjg3V5ETg=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iOS-26-on-Three-iPhones.jpg?lossy)
![MacRumors x Bloomberg Banner Cool](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1af4XiY5l7MKT5h6GgPqIg0XEhQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/MacRumors-x-Bloomberg-Banner-Cool.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 根据彭博社马克·古尔曼的报道，iOS 26 公测版预计本周发布，可能在 7 月 23 日左右。同时发布的还有 iPadOS、macOS 等多个操作系统的公测版，以及首次推出的 AirPods 固件公测版。此外，首个 iOS 27 传闻也已浮出水面，表明苹果将优先为预计明年下半年发布的折叠式 iPhone 开发相关软件功能。用户可免费加入 Apple Beta 软件计划参与测试，但建议提前备份设备。
items.translated_title: iOS 26 公测版预计本周发布，首个 iOS 27 传闻浮出水面
items.content:
The first iOS 26 public beta should arrive this week, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.


"All indications are that iOS 26 should go into the public beta phase this coming week," said Gurman, in his Power On newsletter today.

In a social media post last week, Gurman said that the iOS 26 public beta would likely be released on or around Wednesday, July 23.

Apple previously announced that a public beta of iOS 26 would be available in July, but it did not provide a more specific timeframe.

The first public betas of iPadOS 26, macOS 26, tvOS 26, watchOS 26, and HomePod software 26 should be released alongside the iOS 26 public beta, and Apple is also planning to offer a public beta of its next major AirPods firmware update for the first time. Apple does not plan to offer a visionOS 26 public beta, though, according to its beta website.

Anyone can sign up to be a member of the Apple Beta Software Program, for free, and gain access to the public betas for testing. As always, we highly recommend backing up your devices before installing beta software, in case of issues.

All of the updates are already available in developer beta. A few years ago, Apple dropped the requirement to pay $99 per year for an Apple Developer Program membership in order to access the developer betas, but you still need to have an Apple Developer account. Technically, though, the public should wait for the public betas.

Looking ahead, the first iOS 27 rumor has surfaced.

According to Gurman, Apple will formally kick off development of iOS 27 soon, and the company plans to prioritize software features that are tailored for the long-rumored foldable iPhone. That device is expected to launch in the second half of next year.

Related Roundups: iOS 26, iPadOS 26
Tags: iOS 27, Mark Gurman

items.title: 新款iPad Pro预计今年发布，搭载M5芯片和双前置摄像头 (原标题: New iPad Pro Expected This Year With M5 Chip and Two Front Cameras)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### 新款iPad Pro主要更新

根据彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）在其“Power On”新闻通讯中的报道，苹果下一代iPad Pro型号预计将迎来重要更新。

#### 主要信息来源

*   **马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）**: 彭博社记者，其“Power On”新闻通讯是主要信息来源。
*   **郭明錤（Ming-Chi Kuo）**: 供应链分析师，提供了关于M5芯片iPad Pro量产时间的信息。

#### 关键新特性

*   **双前置摄像头**:
    *   新款iPad Pro将配备两个前置摄像头，分别用于人像和横向模式。
    *   这将允许用户在拍照或进行视频通话时，无需担心设备的方向，提供更灵活的使用体验。
    *   当前搭载M4芯片的iPad Pro型号只有一个前置摄像头，主要设计用于横向模式。
    *   值得注意的是，Face ID功能在iPad Pro上已支持任何方向的识别。
*   **M5芯片**:
    *   下一代iPad Pro将搭载M5芯片。
    *   郭明錤曾表示，搭载M5芯片的iPad Pro型号预计将在2025年下半年进入大规模生产。

#### 与现有型号对比

*   **显示屏与设计**: 去年，iPad Pro已更新了OLED显示屏并采用了更薄的设计。
*   **今年升级**: 预计今年的升级相对较小，主要集中在M5芯片和双前置摄像头。

#### 发布周期与时间预测

*   苹果通常以大约18个月的周期更新iPad Pro。
*   当前搭载M4芯片的iPad Pro型号于2024年5月发布。
*   因此，下一代型号可能会在今年（文章标题暗示）或根据18个月周期和郭明錤的预测，在2025年9月或10月发布。

#### 图片

*   ![iPad Pro 2024](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7rxyhqBCwKf7A_UN7EUtoGJebk8=/400x0/article-new/2024/05/ipad-pro-2024.jpg?lossy)
*   ![MacRumors x Bloomberg Banner Cool](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1af4XiY5l7MKT5h6GgPqIg0XEhQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/MacRumors-x-Bloomberg-Banner-Cool.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 根据彭博社马克·古尔曼的报道，新款iPad Pro预计今年发布。主要更新包括搭载M5芯片和双前置摄像头，后者将支持人像和横向模式拍摄及视频通话，提升使用灵活性。当前型号仅有一个前置摄像头。尽管去年iPad Pro已进行OLED屏和超薄设计更新，今年升级将相对较小。发布周期通常为18个月，M4型号于2024年5月发布，因此下一代可能在今年9月或10月推出，但有分析师预测M5芯片量产需等到2025年下半年。
items.translated_title: 新款iPad Pro预计今年发布，搭载M5芯片和双前置摄像头
items.content:
Apple's next-generation iPad Pro models will be equipped with two front-facing cameras, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.


In his Power On newsletter today, Gurman said the upcoming iPad Pro models with the M5 chip will have both portrait and landscape cameras, letting you capture photos and go on video calls without having to worry about the device's orientation.

The current iPad Pro models with the M4 chip have a single front camera that is designed to be used in landscape orientation.

Face ID already works in any orientation on the iPad Pro.

After being updated with an OLED display and a much thinner design last year, the iPad Pro will likely receive relatively smaller upgrades this year. For now, the key rumored changes include the M5 chip and the dual front cameras.

Last year, Apple supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said iPad Pro models with an M5 chip would enter mass production in the second half of 2025. The current iPad Pro models with the M4 chip launched in May 2024, and Apple typically updates the iPad Pro on a roughly 18-month cycle, so the next models could be released in September or October.

Related Roundup: iPad Pro
Tag: Mark Gurman
Buyer's Guide: iPad Pro (Don't Buy)

items.title: 头条新闻：iPhone 17 颜色、iOS 26 公测版即将发布，以及更多 (原标题: Top Stories: iPhone 17 Colors, iOS 26 Public Beta Incoming, and More)
items.creator: MacRumors Staff
items.summary:
# Apple 最新动态：iPhone 17、iOS 26、可折叠 iPhone 及更多

随着 iPhone 17 系列发布日期的临近，以及 iOS 26 公测版的即将推出，苹果生态系统正迎来一系列重要更新和传闻。

![top stories 2025 07 19](https://images.macrumors.com/t/HMe7hTesth9EE9pdJX6844GPHEw=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/top-stories-2025-07-19.jpg?lossy)

## iPhone 17 系列颜色与特性

*   **颜色泄露：** 据 Macworld 获得的一份“内部文件”显示，iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Air、iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone 17 Pro Max 的所有颜色选项已曝光，其中包括 Pro 和 Pro Max 型号的新“橙色”或铜色。
    ![iPhone 17 Colors](https://images.macrumors.com/t/YHzO6SpGi8A9XKy-yGeuBsFSdQ4=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iPhone-17-Colors.jpg?lossy)
*   **特殊颜色：** 另有传闻称，Pro 型号将有一种与 iOS 26“液态玻璃”主题相关的“特殊”颜色，可能是一种具有折射效果的“白色”，以匹配用户界面设计。
*   **亮点功能：**
    *   全新的超薄“iPhone 17 Air”型号。
    *   全系升级的自拍相机。
    *   Pro 型号可能采用新的橙色调。
    ![iPhone 17 Pro Dark Blue and Orange](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7XLBgJ_gsPE5c6v4M-puP3n8GKc=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iPhone-17-Pro-Dark-Blue-and-Orange.jpg?lossy)
*   **可能不受欢迎的改变：**
    *   更大的后置摄像头凸起。
    *   Pro 型号可能从钛金属回归铝制边框。

## iOS 26 公测版与相关诉讼

*   **公测版发布日期：** 苹果此前宣布 iOS 26 公测版将于 7 月发布，彭博社的 Mark Gurman 称其预计在 7 月 23 日（周三）左右发布。
    ![iOS 26 on Three iPhones](https://images.macrumors.com/t/T-wXm4YuRC1oaKVIYmUjg3V5ETg=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iOS-26-on-Three-iPhones.jpg?lossy)
*   **苹果起诉 Jon Prosser：** 苹果公司已对 YouTuber Jon Prosser 和 Michael Ramacciotti 提起诉讼，指控其盗用商业机密。Prosser 此前曾分享他声称是 iOS 19（后确认为 iOS 26）的渲染图，这些渲染图无疑基于真实的 iOS 开发版本。
    ![ios 19 messages app](https://images.macrumors.com/t/bOtPtT56FGWSNRX9VLXoAlIlUrS=/400x0/article-new/2025/03/ios-19-messages-app.jpg?lossy)

## 可折叠 iPhone 进展

*   **发布时间：** 苹果备受传闻的可折叠 iPhone 预计将于 2026 年末首次亮相，届时将直接与三星等公司竞争。
*   **价格与厚度：** 新报告指出，可折叠 iPhone 的起售价可能在 1,800 至 2,000 美元之间，展开时厚度至少为 4.8 毫米。
*   **屏幕技术：** 苹果将从三星采购“无折痕”显示屏，这项尖端技术也可能在明年应用于三星自己的 Galaxy Z Fold8。
    ![Foldable iPhone 2023 Feature Iridescent 1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/XBA46E0KGSPoa_Rq6oViPmLbNgY=/400x0/article-new/2025/03/Foldable-iPhone-2023-Feature-Iridescent-1.jpg?lossy)

## Apple Watch Ultra 3 预期

*   **新功能：** 预计将支持卫星连接（在无 Wi-Fi 和蜂窝网络覆盖时收发短信）、5G 支持（从 Apple Watch Ultra 2 的 LTE 升级）以及宽视角 OLED 显示屏。

## 苹果智能眼镜

*   **产品定位：** 苹果正在开发一套智能眼镜，旨在与 Meta 流行的人工智能 Ray-Bans 竞争。
*   **初期版本：** 将从无显示屏型号开始，作为 iPhone 配件，提供摄像头、扬声器、传感器和 AI 集成功能。
*   **长期目标：** 最终目标是推出内置显示屏的增强现实智能眼镜。
    ![Apple Galsses Feature Redux 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/m_y5ZCdUD_BA-kyBItZ9AzXiFDY=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/Apple-Galsses-Feature-Redux-2.5.jpg?lossy)

items.content:
We're less than two months away from the official unveiling of the iPhone 17 family, and it seems like things are starting to firm up about just which color options we might see across the four models in the lineup.


The iOS 26 public beta is also rapidly approaching, and we're continuing to hear details about Apple's plans for a foldable iPhone next year, so read on below for all the details on these stories and more!

All 15 New iPhone 17 and iPhone 17 Pro Colors Revealed in Latest Leak


We may finally have a definitive list of all color options for the iPhone 17 series, ahead of the devices launching in September. An "internal document" obtained by Macworld allegedly reveals all of the color options for the upcoming iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max models, including a new "orange" or copper color for the Pro and Pro Max.


Relatedly, a separate rumor claims there is a "special" color for the Pro models connected to the Liquid Glass theme of iOS 26. It's unclear whether this is the "white" color being mentioned by other sources, but it could have a somewhat refractive finish for a glassy look to match the user interface design.

Here's When to Expect the iOS 26 Public Beta


Apple has so far only said that public betas of iOS 26 and the other upcoming major operating system updates will be coming in July, but it now looks like we may have an approximate date, with Bloomberg's Mark Gurman claiming the iOS 26 public beta should be released on or around Wednesday, July 23.


For some of our latest iOS 26 coverage, check out our guides to changes and new features in Messages, Notes and Reminders, and the Camera app.

Apple Sues Jon Prosser Over iOS 26 Leaks


Earlier this year, YouTuber Jon Prosser shared multiple videos showing off what he claimed to be re-created renderings of what was then presumed to be called iOS 19 and which was eventually unveiled by Apple as iOS 26 at WWDC in June.


While not everything exactly matched what Apple unveiled for iOS 26, Prosser's renderings were undoubtedly based on genuine iOS builds from earlier in the development cycle. Apple clearly took notice, as the company filed a lawsuit this week against Prosser and Michael Ramacciotti for misappropriation of trade secrets.

Foldable iPhone's Thickness and Price Range Detailed in New Reports


Apple appears to be gearing up for a late 2026 debut of its long-rumored foldable iPhone, finally putting it into direct competition with Samsung and other companies that have been offering foldables for years.


New rumors suggest the foldable iPhone could have a starting price in the $1,800–$2,000 range and have a thickness of at least 4.8 mm when unfolded. That compares to earlier rumors claiming it could be as thin as 4.5 mm.

Apple is said to be sourcing its "crease-free" display for the device from Samsung, with the cutting-edge technology also likely making its way into Samsung's own Galaxy Z Fold8 next year.

Ranked: The Best Features Rumored for the iPhone 17 Lineup


We have just under two months to go until the debut of Apple's iPhone 17 models, and rumors have been ramping up in recent weeks. To recap, we went through everything we know so far, pulling out the most exciting rumors and highlighting some other changes that aren't going to be so great.


Topping the list are the all-new thin "iPhone 17 Air," upgraded selfie cameras across the board, and a rumored new orange-ish color for the Pro models, while other changes like the large rear camera bump and a return to aluminum instead of titanium for the Pro models may be less well received.

Apple Smart Glasses: Everything We Know About Apple's Answer to Meta Ray-Bans


Apple is working on a set of smart glasses that will rival Meta's popular AI-equipped Ray-Bans, offering many of the same features. Rumors about Apple's work on the glasses have been picking up, and we've gathered all of the information we've heard in a recent guide.


While Apple is working toward augmented-reality smart glasses with a built-in display, it's going to start with display-less models that offer cameras, speakers, sensors, and AI integration to act an as iPhone accessory.

MacRumors Newsletter


Each week, we publish an email newsletter like this highlighting the top Apple stories, making it a great way to get a bite-sized recap of the week hitting all of the major topics we've covered and tying together related stories for a big-picture view.

So if you want to have top stories like the above recap delivered to your email inbox each week, subscribe to our newsletter!

items.title: 苹果将以这两种方式升级iPhone 17显示屏 (原标题: Apple to Upgrade iPhone 17 Displays in These Two Ways)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
根据在中国社交媒体平台微博上拥有超过300万粉丝的Digital Chat Station账号分享的信息，今年晚些时候推出的所有iPhone 17型号都将迎来两项显示屏升级。

**iPhone 17显示屏升级要点：**

*   **更窄的边框：**
    *   Digital Chat Station表示，整个iPhone 17系列都将采用更窄的边框。
    *   苹果曾表示iPhone 16 Pro和iPhone 16 Pro Max拥有其发布产品中最窄的屏幕边框。
    *   现在，这种超窄边框预计将从Pro型号扩展到低端的iPhone 17和“iPhone 17 Air”型号。

*   **全新的灵动岛用户界面：**
    *   该账号称iPhone 17型号将采用新的灵动岛用户界面，但未提供详细说明。
    *   这可能意味着在软件层面，iOS 26将专门为所有iPhone 17型号引入重新设计的灵动岛。
    *   在硬件层面，有传言称灵动岛的开孔会更小，但关于它是在今年的iPhone 17型号上首次亮相还是在明年的iPhone 18型号上，传言存在冲突。

![iphone 16 pro ghost hand](https://images.macrumors.com/t/VpzHcNYVqHZm_CazsJsQK2bbrIE=/400x0/article-new/2023/11/iphone-16-pro-ghost-hand.jpg?lossy)

**信息可靠性与发布时间：**

*   Digital Chat Station过去曾准确泄露过一些未来苹果产品的信息，但目前这些仍是传言。
*   苹果预计将在今年9月发布iPhone 17系列，届时将揭晓更多关于这些传闻中的变化。
items.shortSummary: 据Digital Chat Station爆料，所有iPhone 17型号都将获得两项显示屏升级。首先，整个系列将采用更窄的屏幕边框，将此前Pro型号的超窄边框扩展到标准版和“Air”型号。其次，iPhone 17将配备全新的灵动岛用户界面，可能涉及iOS 26的软件重新设计或更小的硬件开孔（具体发布时间有冲突）。这些仍是传言，苹果预计将在9月发布iPhone 17系列。
items.translated_title: 苹果将以这两种方式升级iPhone 17显示屏
items.content:
All of the iPhone 17 models coming later this year will feature two display upgrades, according to information shared by Digital Chat Station, an account with more than three million followers on Chinese social media platform Weibo.


First, the account said that the entire iPhone 17 series will feature thinner bezels. Apple says the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max feature the thinnest bezels around the screen of any product it has ever released, and those ultra-thin bezels should now expand from the Pro models to the lower-end iPhone 17 and "iPhone 17 Air" models.

Second, the account said that the iPhone 17 models will feature a new Dynamic Island user interface, but they did not elaborate. It may be that, on the software side, iOS 26 introduces a redesigned Dynamic Island exclusively on all iPhone 17 models. On the hardware side, a smaller Dynamic Island cutout has been rumored, but rumors have conflicted about whether it will debut on the iPhone 17 models this year or on the iPhone 18 models next year.

Digital Chat Station has accurately leaked some information regarding future Apple products in the past, but these are still just rumors for the time being.

Apple will unveil the iPhone 17 series in September, so we will learn more about these rumored changes and more in less than two months from now.
